abstract: Luminaries of business, politics and entertainment attended a memorial service for Steve Jobs.
snippet: Luminaries of business, politics and entertainment attended a memorial service for Steve Jobs.
lead_paragraph: An array of figures from technology, entertainment and politics assembled on the campus of Stanford University on Sunday night to pay tribute to Steven P. Jobs, Apple's late chief executive and co-founder.

headline.main: A Star-Studded Memorial to Steve Jobs
